question: “Hunar Haat” is an initiative of which Union Ministry of India?
option4: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
explanation:
“Hunar Haat” is an initiative of the Union Ministry of Minority Affairs, Government of India. Under the initiative, stalls are set up, where master artisans, craftsmen and culinary experts from across the country participate, to show case their talents. It aims at providing employment opportunities to indigenous artisans and preserving the culture of our country. 
Recently, the Ministry inaugurated ‘Hunar Haat’ in Indore, Madhya Pradesh on February 9 and at India Gate lawns, New Delhi on February 13.
